posts.title: Hexo Boot Docs
posts.text: 主站点nextbutterflylandscape2yearnyiliashokaindigoapollolandscapecactusmateryicarusfluidmaterialsakuraparticlex How To Install1. Create Your Blog Source Code Project1git clone https://github.com/fightinggg/Hexo-Boot-Demo.git 2. Push Your Project To GITHUBJust like This Project 3. Config Your GITHUB SettingsYou Need To Config DOCKERUSERNAME: Docker Username (For login Dockerhub and pull Images, You can register on here) DOCKERPASSWORD: Docker Password HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI: Your SSH primary key 4. Create Your Blog Pages ProjectJust like This Project 5. Config Your Blog Source CodeOpen file /themes-configs/config.propertiesEdit pages.root： your blog root dir，and is the name of Your Blogs Pages Project git.user: your name git.email: your email git.repo: your Blog Pages Project ssh git address image 6. Need More Themes?If you want to install more hexo themes, edit themes.name themes.git and themes.dep themes[i].name: your theme’s name themes[i].git: your theme’s http git address themes[i].dep: your theme’s depends 7. Enjoy Your SelfNow Your Can Find that , Your Blog Source Code Project’s GITHUB Action is running… And Your Blog Is Deploy To Your Blog Pages Project

posts.title: Hexo Boot Docs ZH
posts.text: 主站点nextbutterflylandscape2yearnyiliashokaindigoapollolandscapecactusmateryicarusfluidmaterialsakuraparticlex 如何安装1. 创建Blog源码1git clone https://github.com/fightinggg/Hexo-Boot-Demo.git 2. 推送到GITHUB和这个项目 一样 3. 配置源码GITHUB设置你需要配置 DOCKERUSERNAME: Docker 用户名 (用来登录Dockerhub 和下载镜像,你可以在这里注册) DOCKERPASSWORD: Docker 密码 HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI: 你自己的SSH密钥（用来推送博客） 4.创建GITHUB页面和这个项目 一样 5. 配置你的BLog源码打开文件 /themes-configs/config.properties编辑下面内容 pages.root： 你博客的根目录，同时也是GITHUB 页面项目的名字 git.user: 你的名字 git.email: 你的邮箱 git.repo: 你GITHUB页面项目的SSH地址 image 6. 需要配置更多的主题？如果你想要更多的主题，编辑 themes.name themes.git and themes.dep themes[i].name: 主题名字 themes[i].git: 主题地址 themes[i].dep: 主题的依赖 7. 开心享受多主题Hexo博客吧你现在会发现，你的博客源码项目的GITHUB ACTION已经运行起来了，马上你的GITHUB页面就会被部署
